title: Ticket #520: GlideIn Mechanism Enhancements
description:
There are three main features requested to improve the glidein mechanism.

  1. #39 DONE Have the collector add authentication information into the Machine Ads that it receives

  2. #161 DONE VOMS Support

  3. #221 DONE Support for limited proxy delegation

VOMS Support detail:

  1. DONE Extract VOMS attributes at submit time and place them into Job Ad
  2. DONE Allow VOMS attributes to be used in the condor mapfile
  3. DONE Change the current implementation to stop using ':' as a separator and instead use a pipe '|' (5 minutes)
  4. DONE Support quoting of separator since all characters are legal in FQANs. (1 day)
  5. *DONE Add expat as either a prereq or external (1/2 day)
  6. DONE Add VOMS itself as an external (1/2 day)
  7. DONE Test, commit, and document everything (1 day)

Limited Proxy Delegation detail:

  1. Identify when proxies should be limited and how the limitation is specified (1/2 day)
  2. Make code changes to support policy identified above (1 day)
  3. Test, commit, and document everything (1/2 day)
